reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater extremely soft and comfortable, with one mentioning it's not itchy at all. The color receives positive feedback, and customers appreciate its warmth, with one noting it's great for winter. The quality and sizing receive mixed reviews, with some finding it excellent while others say it's cheaply made, and one customer notes the sleeves are not in proportion.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars cute
items.body: Lovely warm sweater with a beautiful design and a reasonable price. Great with jeans. Read more
items.author: F. Davis

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Extremely soft
items.body: True to size, and extremely soft and comfortable. I’m not sure about washing and how it will keep its size. If it washes well I will definitely order another one. Very happy will this sweater. Read more
items.author: Debbie Russell

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fair Isle Sweater
items.body: Love this sweater! A couple of caveats: there are absolutely no tags Inside sweater. I had to go back to my order to check that it was all acrylic (no Wool) size. I ordered large & I should have ordered XL. Sweater fits but I was hoping for the oversize look. Sweater description says long sleeve. I am 5’4 » » & sleeves are only 3/4 length on me & I have shorter than average arms. All Said, I would recommend this sweater. Read more
items.author: Tylergal

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So soft and high quality!
items.body: Got many admiring glances just the first time. Photo didn't convey the softness and high quality. The design is perfect. Not too much but just enough fall sweater hygge. Read more
items.author: Lisa Parsley

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cheaply made/yarn
items.body: Tremendously attractive style and colors; but so cheaply made, it stretches out of shape, becomes baggy immediately. I decided to keep mine, but hesitate to wear it out in public again. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Return Policy & Poor Sewing
items.body: Sleeves are not in proportion to sweater and are too short. I do not have long arms nor is sleeve length ever an issue for me. The sweater is poorly made garbage from China, and I have to pay the postage to have this subpar item returned to China. Read more
items.author: Mandu

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love at first sight
items.author: Pauline Spiegel

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Blue Brown, White Brown, New-pink, Beige, White Gray, New-green, White Blue, New-purple, Blue, New-black, New-red, Pink02, Light Green, New-blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
